front.title: Using MAC-authenticated Encryption in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document specifies the conventions for using MAC-authenticated encryption with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) authenticated- enveloped-data content type. This mirrors the use of a MAC combined with an encryption algorithm that's already employed in IPsec, SSL/ TLS, and SSH, which is widely supported in existing crypto libraries and hardware, and has been extensively analysed by the crypto community.
